std.value: Where is the school library? When do we have to arrive at school every day?
std.ai: Where is the school library? When do we have to arrive at school every day?

std.value: How many students are there in the school? What after-school activities will our school hold?
std.ai: How many students are there in the school? What after-school activities will our school hold?

std.value: Who is our head teacher? How often do we have P.E. classes every week?
std.ai: Who is our head teacher? How often do we have P.E. classes every week?

std.value: How many classrooms are there in the school? What time do we finish class every day?
std.ai: How many classrooms are there in the school? What time do we finish class every day?

std.value: How do you like the teachers in this school? Where is the school canteen?
std.ai: How do you like the teachers in this school? Where is the school canteen?

std.value: How many classes do we have every day? Who is the most strict teacher in our school?
std.ai: How many classes do we have every day? Who is the most strict teacher in our school?

std.value: How many buildings are there in the school? How many teachers are there in the school?

std.value: How many clubs are there in our school? When do we finish class every day?
std.ai: How many clubs are there in our school? When do we finish class every day?

std.value: How do you like the teaching methods in this school? Are there many school rules?

std.value: Where is our teacher’s office? Where is the nearest subway station?

std.value: Where is the physics laboratory in our school? Where is the chemistry laboratory in our school?
std.ai: Where is the physics laboratory in our school? Where is the chemistry laboratory in our school?

std.value: Are the students in this school easy to get along with? Are the teachers in this school easy to get along with?

std.value: Do we have much homework to do? Are there many school rules?

question.ask: Questions 1~2   You have just transferred to a new school, and you are not familiar with your new school. Ask your deskmate two questions about the school.
question.keywords: where library|when arrive school|how many students|what activities|who teacher|where canteen|how often classes|how many classrooms|what time finish classes|how like|how many buildings|how many teachers|how many clubs|how many classes|where office|where station|where laboratory|when finish|get along|homework|rules

std.value: Where will the art exhibition be held? When will the exhibition be held?
std.ai: Where will the art exhibition be held? When will the exhibition be held?

std.value: What is the art exhibition about? How long will the art exhibition last?
std.ai: What is the art exhibition about? How long will the art exhibition last?

std.value: Who holds the art exhibition? What is on display at the art exhibition?
std.ai: Who holds the art exhibition? What is on display at the art exhibition?

std.value: When will the exhibition begin? When will the exhibition end?
std.ai: When will the exhibition begin? When will the exhibition end?

std.value: How much is the ticket to the art exhibition? Who is the art exhibition held by?
std.ai: How much is the ticket to the art exhibition? Who is the art exhibition held by?

std.value: How much does each ticket to the art exhibition cost? What is the theme of the art exhibition?
std.ai: How much does each ticket to the art exhibition cost? What is the theme of the art exhibition?

std.value: Will there be any performances at the exhibition? Whose works are on display?
std.ai: Will there be any performances at the exhibition? Whose works are on display?

std.value: How shall we go to the art exhibition? How will we go to the art exhibition?
std.ai: How shall we go to the art exhibition? How will we go to the art exhibition?

std.value: How much should we pay for the ticket to the art exhibition? Whose works are on display?
std.ai: How much should we pay for the ticket to the art exhibition? Whose works are on display?

question.ask: Questions 3~4  One of your friends invited you to go to an art exhibition with him. Ask him two questions about the art exhibition.
question.keywords: where held|when held|what about|when begin|when end|how long last|how much ticket|who holds|who held by|what display|what theme|will performances|whose display|how go
